name: Deific Spade
lore:
&7Use to reveal and dig up &eGriffin

&eBurrows &7in the hub while Diana's

&2Mythological Ritual &7is active.



&7Maximum Burrow Chain Length: &a8



&7Burrows dug with this item may contain:

&8 ● &cMonsters

&8 ● &fGriffin Feathers

&8 ● &6Coins

&8 ● &9Mythos Fragments

&8 ● &5Braided Griffin Feathers



&6Ability: Echo  &e&lRIGHT CLICK&r

&7Show the way to the next or nearby Griffin

&7burrow.

&8Cooldown: &a1s



&8This item can be reforged!
